power.title: A Rock and a Hard Place
power.fluff: You focus to work in concert with your companions, harrying your opponents with relentless blows

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Until the end of the encounter, you and allies in your warlord's aura can use the Relentless Pressure attack at-will. Only one character can use the action during a given turn.

section.name: Trigger:
section.text: An enemy adjacent to the acting character attacks one or more of the character's allies, and misses all of them

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The acting character deals damage to the target equal to your [Intelligence or Wisdom] modifier + the enhancement bonus of the character's weapon. If the acting character can make a melee basic attack using an implement, it can use that implement's enhancement bonus instead of weapon enhancement bonus.
If the acting character's melee basic attack deals a type of damage, this action deals the same type of damage and gains the corresponding keyword.

power.title: Archery Commander
power.fluff: Your words advice your allies in avoiding retaliatory attacks and guide them to focused attention as they loose arrows and spells at your enemy

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Until the end of the encounter, you do not provoke reactive strikes for making ranged attacks, and your warlord's aura gains the following benefits:
Allies in the aura do not provoke reactive strikes from enemies you can see when making ranged attacks.

When an ally hits an enemy you can see with a ranged attack, the next ally in your aura that hits that same enemy with a ranged attack deals additional damage equal your [Intelligence or Wisdom] modifier.

power.title: Bait the Hook
power.fluff: Your attacks and parries give an ally the encouragement and strength needed to respond to the foe's attacks

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Until the end of the encounter, you gain the following benefits:

When you attack an enemy, choose one ally in your warlord's aura. Until the end of your next turn, the target of your attack has vulnerable all against the chosen ally's attacks. The vulnerable equals your [Intelligence or Wisdom] modifier.
When an enemy attacks you, choose one ally in your warlord's aura as a free reaction. The chosen ally has combat advantage against the enemy until the start of that enemy's next turn.

When an enemy bloodies you or scores a critical hit against you, you can use a free reaction to grant all allies in your warlord's aura a bonus to their first damage roll against that enemy. The bonus equals your [Wisdom or Charisma] modfier, and lasts until the end of the enemy's next turn.

power.title: Brave Warriors
power.fluff: Your charge emboldens your allies to do the same

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Until the end of the encounter, you gain the following benefits:
Your charge attacks deal +1[W] damage, or +1d8 damage if your charge attack is not a Weapon attack.
When you charge an enemy, allies who can see you gain a +1 bonus to attack rolls against the target of your charge until the end of your next turn. This increases to +2 if the ally charges the enemy.
When you hit with a charge attack, until the end of your next turn, allies gain a +1 power bonus to AC, and a power bonus to Will equal to one-half your [Wisdom or Charisma] modifier.

power.title: Create Opportunity
power.fluff: Your precisely timed attacks disrupt your foe's concentration, buying time for an ally to act

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Until the end of the encounter, you gain the following benefits:

When you hit an enemy in your warlord's aura with a ranged attack, one ally adjacent to the enemy can use a free reaction to either make a melee basic attack against it or to shift a number of squares equal to your [Intelligence or Wisdom] modifier.

When you hit an enemy with a melee attack, one ally in your warlord's aura can use a free reaction to either make a ranged basic attack against it or to gain a bonus to all defenses against it until the end of your next turn. The bonus equals one-half your [Wisdom or Charisma] modifier.

power.title: Exemplar of Action
power.fluff: Your series of feints and slashes cows your foe, preparing it for your allies

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Until the end of the encounter, you gain the following benefits:
You and allies in your warlord's aura deal +3 additional damage against enemies that grant combat advantage for the attack, or +5 damage against weakened enemies.
When you hit an enemy with a melee attack, that enemy grants combat advantage until the start of your next turn.
When you hit an enemy granting combat advantage with a melee attack, that enemy is weakened (save ends).

power.title: Pike Hedge
power.fluff: You set yourself and your allies to foil enemy movement, ready to strike at anyone who approaches another comrade

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Until the end of the encounter, you and allies in your warlord's aura can use the Punishing Hedge attack at-will. Only one character can use the action during a given turn.

section.name: Trigger:
section.text: An enemy willingly moves to a square within the acting character's reach and adjacent to the character's ally

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The acting character deals damage to the target equal to the character's Strength modifier + the enhancement bonus of the character's weapon.

If the acting character can use a different ability modifier for his or her damage roll on a melee basic attack, he or she can deal damage based on that ability modifier instead. If the acting character can make a melee basic attack using an implement, it can use that implement's enhancement bonus instead of weapon enhancement bonus.
If the character's melee basic attack deals a type of damage, this action deals the same type of damage and gains the corresponding keyword.

power.title: Scent of Victory
power.fluff: As your enemies stagger from their wounds, you can smell victory and your allies respond to your victorious cry

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Until the end of the encounter, allies in your warlord's aura gain a +1 bonus to attack rolls against bloodied enemies. This increases to +2 on triggered attack rolls.
You can also use the Cry for Blood attack at-will while this power lasts.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Each target can make a melee basic attack against a bloodied enemy as an opportunity reaction.

power.title: Stand the Fallen
power.fluff: You call to your comrades, lifting their spirit and restoring their will to fight

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Until the end of the encounter, allies in your warlord's aura can stand from prone as a minor action.
You can use the Rousing Call action at-will until the end of the encounter.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Each target gains temporary hit points equal to one-half his or her healing surge value + your [Wisdom or Charisma] modifier. A bloodied target can choose to instead regain the same number of hit points.

A target that already had the same amount or more temporary hit points instead gains a bonus to his or her first damage roll before the end of his or her next turn. The bonus equals your [Wisdom or Charisma] modifier.
A prone target can stand from prone as a free reaction.

power.title: Surging Assault
power.fluff: Your strike gives an ally the means to recover from his or her injuries, and his or her recovery in turn gets your fighting spirit up

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Until the end of the encounter, when you hit with an attack, an ally in your warlord's aura can use his or her second wind as a free reaction.

Also, when an ally in your aura spends a healing surge to regain hit points, your first attack before the end of your next turn deals an additional +1[W] damage, or +1d8 damage if it is not a Weapon attack.

power.title: Terrain Advantage
power.fluff: With your guidance, your team manages to press the advantage against enemies in a precarious position

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Until the end of the encounter, enemies in your warlord's aura have vulnerable 2 to all damage while they are in difficult terrain.
Also, you and allies in your aura gain a bonus to damage rolls when attacking from higher ground. The bonus equals your [Intelligence or Wisdom] modifier.
